revised_title: Arthur James Ewins: A Pioneering Chemist and Researcher
tldr: Arthur James Ewins was a talented chemist and researcher who made significant contributions to the fields of biochemistry, organic chemistry, and pharmacology. He worked closely with George Barger and P.P. Laidlaw, conducting research on alkaloids, proteinogenous amines, and histamine. Ewins's work laid the foundation for further advancements in these areas and earned him recognition as an accomplished scientist.
